name: cursor-agent-pm
description: In-IDE Project Management Extension for Cursor Agents
purpose: To bridge the gap between chat-based development and structured project management by treating tickets as code artifacts.

core.name: Kanban Board
core.details: Basic drag-and-drop. Missing swimlanes, responsiveness, and rich card details.

core.name: Ticket Creation
core.details: Create via command or clipboard (structured text parsing)

core.name: Context Management
core.details: Manual copy of ticket context. Missing auto-injection and chat binding.

chat_integration.name: Questionnaire Wizard
chat_integration.details: Interactive chat flow to create tickets

chat_integration.name: Auto-Export
chat_integration.details: Convert chat sessions to tickets automatically

advanced.name: Search
advanced.details: Implemented but loses focus on type.
